name: Nancy Drew®: The Creature of Kapu Cave
description: Team up with the Hardy Boys® and Track an Ancient Legend Through Hawaii!
minimum_requirements: OS: Window XP/Vista                     Processor: 1 GHz or greater Pentium or equivalent class CPU                     Memory: 128 MB of RAM                     Graphics: 32 MB DirectX 9.0 compatible video card                     DirectX: 8.0                     Hard Drive: 1 GB or more of hard drive space                     Sound: 16 bit DirectX compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: A blast from my past! While not the best graphically, and actually a bit of a simple game, this point-and-click adventure still brought a smile to my face.

I really liked this game. The puzzles were fun and the fact that you can play the Hardy Boys is a fun twist.   The seashell collecting and the fishing was a little tedious, and the ending wasn't as satisfying as other Nancy Drew games, but it was still pretty interesting.   I'd give this game a 7 out of 10.
